EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal For Our Webinar: The Platform for Building Great Software on 1/30
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, I'd like to extend an invitation to join my team on January 30, 2014 at 1PM CST for an exclusive first look at Pivotal One, a comprehensive, multi-cloud Enterprise PaaS that runs on top of Pivotal CF, the leading enterprise distribution of the Cloud Foundry platform. Conversations and direct observations working with our customers confirm it is vital for enterprises to become excellent at delivering software at internet scale. Pivotal's new solution enables enterprise companies to bring new innovation to market faster than ever before, enabling agile development teams to rapidly update and scale applications across public or private clouds. Moderated by Dekel Tankel, Director of Customer Engagement for Cloud Foundry, this webinar will explore: - Why PaaS and Pivotal One, and why now? - The essential features of enterprise PaaS - Building a new class of data centric applications using Pivotal One - Extending Pivotal One with new services and runtimes Register Now>> I look forward to having you join us. Regards, Tony Simpson Account Manager - Central Region tsimpson@gopivotal.com (512) 568-3787 Check out Pivotal P.O.V.
